typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		row_id as string,
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string,
		insert_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ClientsSource
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ClientsTarget
ClientsSource, ClientsTarget join(ClientsSource@id == ClientsSource@id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'both')~> Imported
Imported alterRow(insertIf(isNull(ClientsTarget@id))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		internal_id = ClientsSource@internal_id,
		logo = ClientsSource@logo,
		footer = ClientsSource@footer,
		client_type = ClientsSource@client_type,
		sage_reference = ClientsSource@sage_reference,
		manager_id = ClientsSource@manager_id,
		contract_expiry = ClientsSource@contract_expiry,
		store_locator = ClientsSource@store_locator,
		created_at = ClientsSource@created_at,
		modified_at = ClientsSource@modified_at,
		org_level1_name = ClientsSource@org_level1_name,
		org_level2_name = ClientsSource@org_level2_name,
		org_level3_name = ClientsSource@org_level3_name,
		org_level4_name = ClientsSource@org_level4_name,
		entity_source = ClientsSource@entity_source,
		id = ClientsSource@id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> WriteToClients
